*Shadow Cat runs up to where Iron Raptor was standing, panting and out of 
breath, she leans on a tree, hoping that the things didn't follow her. She 
looks over her shoulder and doesn't see anything, so doesn't worry. She 
walks near Iron Raptor in time to hear her and Lionos speeches. She 
immedietly dislikes Liono, what fool would be that cruel and inconsiderate 
to their commander? Him obviously. Her eyes narrowed when he turned his back 
on her and began to walk away. What an Ass hole! She ran and caught up with 
him, dashing in front of him, cutting him off.*

" You are the most disrespectable, ego-centric, self centered ass-fucker 
i've EVER seen, and i've seen alot! You have no right to talk that way to 
Iron Raptor. Not only is she your leader, but she has more brains than you 
have and a heart of gold, which is more than you will ever have. If you 
don't like her methods, then go join the preds!"




>From: "RYO D" <striderzero1@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Iron I  Don't  need a Reply
>Date: Thu, 18 Jan 2001 18:39:45 -0000
>
>::Liono Prime::
>Liono dislikes her attitude his eyes narrow "Iron use your brain of more
>than a stopper for the air whizzing between your ears." Liono reflects if
>she thinks everything someone says is questioning her command he show what 
>a
>question command is. "Iron you know what your problem is when your not
>P.M.S. ing is your to damn scared to give a order. I can only speak for
>myself but were not mind readers. Think about with a base this damaged your
>fighter are outnumbers and out skilled the only reason it wouldn't be scrap
>is A) there looking for something or B)Your going to surrender." Liono 
>turns
>to leave and Stops "O Yeah if you were wondering thats question and
>disrespecting your Command also be careful pride comes before the fall!"
>Before she can reply Liono walks away.
>
>::Dark Convoy::
>Dark looks at R  "They called me Hot Headed!We better follow." Walks after
>his Little Bro and Climbs into Hasaimon.
>
>::Rinoa::
>"Your not the fireball you claim to be."  As she enters Hasaimon.
>
>::Liono::
>Liono goes open a port on the top whistles.
>
>::Hasaimon::
>Hasaimon lifts off Cloaks and dissappears heading ????.
>
>::Inu & Tiamat::
>Flying not to far behind with 3 riders Koj, Wild Wing, Lilly cloak.
